info.name: Firefox - Combo Style:aero glass,FxButton,addonbar
info.description:
This style for Windows Vista/7 changes:

-Smaller Firefox Button.
-Smaller addon bar in bottom right corner (Show/hide with Ctrl+Shift+7).
-Aero Glass Download Manager.
-Aero Glass about:blank tab with Firefox Logo.
info.additionalInfo:
This style uses and modifies code from various styles:
http://userstyles.org/styles/41182/firefox-4-about-blank-glass http://userstyles.org/styles/19561/downloads-manager-full-glass-transparency-ff3-5 http://userstyles.org/styles/45628/glass-addonbar-for-firefox-4

Thanks to those authors, without them this style can't exists.

Before:http://userstyles.org/style_screenshots/51568_before.jpeg
After:http://userstyles.org/style_screenshots/51568_after.jpeg
